page.title: 10Pocket Money in Patchway
page.content: I spend my pocket money on sweets, toys and gifts for my mum and dad. I get varying amounts of pocket money. Sometimes I keep my money to buy presents for Christmas and Mothers day and birthdays. Sometimes I save it up for my holiday to buy things there. When I get sweets I normally get Chewits or Opal Fruits. When I get toys, I normally get games. I get chocolates or ornaments for my mum. For my dad I get Bon-Bons or Jelly Babies. I like buying presents for my mum and dad and sometimes I buy little presents for my cat and my brother, like a squeaky toy mouse or Battle Action Force, which is a comic that my brother likes. My brother also likes Nutty with Bananaman in it which is great to read in the day.
